整.definition: (bound form) whole; complete; entire; (before a measure word) whole; (before or after number + measure word) exactly; (bound form) in good order; tidy; neat; (bound form) to put in order; to straighten; (bound form) to repair; to mend; to renovate; (coll.) to fix sb; to give sb a hard time; to mess with sb; (dialect) to tinker with; to do sth to

整修.definition: to repair; to refurbish; to renovate; to refit; to mend; to rebuild

整備.definition: preparedness; to bring sth to a state of readiness

整型.definition: (computing) integer; (Tw) to perform or undergo plastic surgery (variant of 整形[zheng3xing2])

整夜.definition: the whole night; all through the night

整妝.definition: same as 整裝|整装; to get ready (for a journey)

整年累月.definition: month after month, year after year; year in, year out

整建.definition: to restore a damaged or aging structure; to renovate

整形.definition: shaping; reshaping; plastic surgery or orthopedics (abbr. of 整形外科[zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1])

整形外科醫生.pinyin: zhěng xíng wài kē yī shēng

整改.definition: to reform; to rectify and improve

整日.definition: all day long; the whole day

整治.definition: to bring under control; to regulate; to restore to good condition; (coll.) to fix (a person); to prepare (a meal etc)

整流.definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)

整流器.definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)

整理.definition: to arrange; to tidy up; to sort out; to straighten out; to list systematically; to collate (data, files); to pack (luggage)

整肅.definition: strict; serious; solemn; dignified; to tidy up; to clean up; to purge; to adjust

整裝.definition: to equip; to fit out; to get ready (for a journey); to arrange (clothes) to be ready

整裝待發.definition: to get ready (for a journey); ready and waiting

整訓.definition: to drill troops; to build up and train

整除.definition: to divide exactly without remainder (in integer arithmetic)

整隊.definition: to dress (troops); to line up (to arrange in a straight line)

整頓.definition: to tidy up; to reorganize; to consolidate; to rectify

整風.definition: Rectification or Rectifying incorrect work styles, Maoist slogan; cf Rectification campaign 整風運動|整风运动, army purge of 1942-44 and anti-rightist purge of 1957

整風運動.definition: Rectification campaign; political purge; cf Mao's 1942-44 campaign at Yanan, and his 1950 and 1957 anti-rightist purges

整飭.definition: (literary) to put in good order; to make shipshape; (literary) orderly; neat; tidy

整體.definition: whole entity; entire body; synthesis; as a whole (situation, construction, team etc); global; macrocosm; integral; holistic; whole

整體數位服務網路.pinyin: zhěng tǐ shù wèi fú wù wǎng lù

整體服務數位網路.pinyin: zhěng tǐ fú wù shù wèi wǎng lù

整點.definition: time of day exactly on the hour (i.e. 12:00, 1:00 etc); to make an inventory; (math.) point that has integer coordinates

整齊劃一.definition: to be adjusted to uniformity (usually of weights and measures) (idiom)
